unstyled.description: Whether to remove the component's style.

aria-label.description: The aria-label of each slider thumb. Useful for providing an accessible name to the slider

aria-labelledby.description: The `id` of the elements that labels each slider thumb. Useful for providing an accessible name to the slider

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the slider when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the value of the slider.

form.description: The associate form of the underlying input element.

getAriaValueText.description: Function that returns a human readable value for the slider thumb

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  thumb: (index: number) => string
  hiddenInput: (index: number) => string
  control: string
  track: string
  range: string
  label: string
  valueText: string
  marker: (index: number) => string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the slider. Useful for composition.

max.description: The maximum value of the slider

min.description: The minimum value of the slider

minStepsBetweenThumbs.description:
The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.

`minStepsBetweenThumbs` * `step` should reflect the gap between the thumbs.

- `step: 1` and `minStepsBetweenThumbs: 10` => gap is `10`
- `step: 10` and `minStepsBetweenThumbs: 2` => gap is `20`

name.description: The name associated with each slider thumb (when used in a form)

onFocusChange.description: Function invoked when the slider's focused index changes

onValueChange.description: Function invoked when the value of the slider changes

onValueChangeEnd.description: Function invoked when the slider value change is done

origin.description:
The origin of the slider range. The track is filled from the origin
to the thumb for single values.
- "start": Useful when the value represents an absolute value
- "center": Useful when the value represents an offset (relative)
- "end": Useful when the value represents an offset from the end

step.description: The step value of the slider

thumbAlignment.description:
The alignment of the slider thumb relative to the track
- `center`: the thumb will extend beyond the bounds of the slider track.
- `contain`: the thumb will be contained within the bounds of the track.

value.description: The controlled value of the slider

colorPalette.description: The color palette of the component

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
